metadata.title: CVE-2022-0137 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap buffer overflow in image_set_mask function of HTMLDOC before 1.9.15allows an attacker to write outside the buffer boundaries.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
